"A.P.238/4/9/12:30": "That's enough! That was great, I really enjoyed watching your performance!"
"However... your performance was slightly lacking."
"That being said, your ability to pull through to the end is what is required of being in ARKS!"
"You didn't place anything above average, but you at least proved that you don't totally suck."
"And I won't let you complain that this was rigged or anything. Because, I am amazing! I am perfect!"
"If this is all you're capable of then we'll leave it at that!"
"Now, head back this event is ov-"
"What's this feeling?"
"I know someone's here! Come out!"
"You're not too bad for ARKS."
"I was trying to stay unnoticed, but I guess I'm not quite used to this body yet."
"What are you?"
"Do I really look that out of place? I think I look normal enough, don't I?"
"I was just sneaking a peek. It seemed like something fun to do."
"Besides..."
"I wanted to see the person who was able to hold back [Elder]"
"[Elder], the Dark Falz from before..."
"You don't have to be so tense. I'm not here to fight right now."
"So don't be so stiff. Common, relax."
"Hey!"
"What? Unless you want to die I'm not interested in obliging anything else."
"That face... just who are you!?"
"I'm your enemy."
"Or should I say that ARKS are our enemy."
"To be honest if possible I didn't want to meet you here. Honestly, I should kill you."
"But right now, I'm not in the mood. I'll just pretend I didn't see you."
"Later. Next time I see you will be to kill you. So be careful."
"You saw that just now, right?"
"That way of speaking, that immense pressure... right now that was-"
"Dark Falz... maybe"
"She looked similar to that mask guy"
"If you think so too, then that's probably what it was."
"Yeah, definitely seems like that guy we ran into on Naberius."
"But still, it felt like that Dark Falz's presence when talking to her."
"Like there are two people talking at once."
"But why!? Why did it have to be her?"
"Sorry, I'm just a little rattled, things I can't comprehend just keep happening."
"I can't believe how bad my luck is."
"Out all of all of the people on all of the ships in Oracle, why did it have to turn out like this?"
